title: A pair of great looking 1911 Obak PSA 4s for sale...
author: Archive

posts.post_title: A pair of great looking 1911 Obak PSA 4s for sale...
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian McQueen

Offering two very nice 1911 Obaks for sale - Lamline and Dillon. Both cards feature mostly charp corners, very little wear, no wrinkling and damage free backs.  Your choice of either card for $110 apiece.  Or $200 for the pair which is a really nice price for PSA 4s.

Thanks in advance,
Brian
